page.title: 17FARMING
page.content: FARMING-Details of 2 Whittington farms HARKAWAY FARM-The map shows this as Crookbarrow Farm.It has a barn for hay and two for straw.It has 2 farrowing crate buildings and a big cattle barn. 1/6 of the barn is pig corn,consisting of sow & weaner food,fast grower food and cattle corn.There's a big barn for pigs,the sows are chained one side and the boar is let loose.There are sows with young piglets on the other side with older piglets called weaners. WOODHALL FARM-It has 3 barns holding hay and straw.Farm stock consists of some 105 cows,18 horses and 450 sheep. The main stock is sheep & beef cattle. The land is used for corn and hay for grass.It has 6 cattle yards and 4 grain silos. Three tractors only are kept at the farm, others being held on smaller farms which are part of the much larger Woodhall Estate.
